page.title: 10Housing 6 Continued and 7
page.content:
The cheapest property at the moment is at 35,950 and the most expensive property at the moment is worth 225,000. {Tolworth Broadway (B) The people that we questioned had been living here for around 17 to 30 years.They were all born in this area.All the houses are owner occupied and are the first houses the people we questioned have owned.There were no tenants.The people thought that they will stay for a long time to come. { {Housing 7 {Broomfield Road.
The average time people have lived in these houses is about 20 years.The property in Broomfield Road was built around 1909.The houses are mostly semi detached.
